model

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to manage data regarding BetFairs responses. The BetFair API regards markets, runners and games differently at different levels of the API. For example Initially a market is referred to with its english name and then deeper in the API (such as calling for the list of catalogues for it) it's only referred to with an ID. Request replys for runners with one request come back as english names and at another only Ids. This class managers the mapping of names to Ids, the list of markets we're tracking, when they start etc. It works purely with data and performs no direct calls to the API.
    Author:
    Craig
